name.ja: <ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>頭<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>キング・レックス

text.en: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "King Rex the Twin-Headed Dragon" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster on the field with less ATK than the total ATK of all Dinosaur monsters you control; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "King Rex the Twin-Headed Dragon" once per turn.
